title: No Fee 3 Bed 2 Bath On-site parking Close to Train
posting_body: ['Three bedroom 2 bath for rent in New Rochelle, NY -', 'Three bedroom apartment for rent  on-site parking in walking distance to metro north!', "The building has a Fitness Center with state of the art equipment and flat screen TV's (membership charge applies).", 'Outdoor and indoor garage spot available for a fee.', 'The building is a short walk to the metro north', 'and there is a bus-stop right outside!', 'There is also a Laundry room with smart-card access.', 'Available September', '$3,395.00 Per Month', 'Utilities included in the rent: Heat, Hot Water and Cooking Gas.', '*No Pets', '* Public transportation near the building to White Plains and Fordham Rd., Bx.', '* Walk to Metro North Railroad', 'One Bedroom Rental New Rochelle, NY', 'Evenings & weekends call  917-642-0201 or 888-773-9792', '1 Bedroom 1.5 Baths Rental New Rochelle New York', 'Parking available for additional fee', 'Visit our website <URL>', 'For appointment to view please call Owner/Management office Monday-Friday (914) 630-7009 *Evenings and week-ends call 888-773-9792', 'Photos of kitchen and bathroom are typical of renovation for this unit being advertised !!', 'New Rochelle and 300 Pelham Road are ideally and conveniently located in lower Westchester County making it an easy to commute to anywhere.', "It is easily accessible to New York's Grand Central station with a 30 minute commute.", 'It is located a short 10 minute ride from southern Connecticut accessible by either rail or car.', 'The New England Thruway and the Hutchinson River Parkway are within minutes of the building.', 'For All Inquires on this one Bedroom for rent in New Rochelle, NY', 'Keystone Realty Associates', '(914) 630-7009', '<URL>', 'Evenings & weekends 888-773-9792', 'Servicing the Larchmont, New Rochelle, Port Chester, Ossining areas.', 'Two Bedroom Rental New Rochelle, NY', 'One Bedroom Rental Port Chester, NY']
